title: Equipment Features
tags: where to get equipment in bg3
content: Equipment Features in Baldur's Gate 3, are the passive effects or conditions provided by wielding certain Equipment. The effects gained from equipment features are usually passive effects that will help you in combat. These effects don't require any kind of energy but they are only triggered by a certain condition required to happen.
